statements: SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM game_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_description FROM game_events WHERE event_name LIKE '%Final%';
SELECT * FROM game_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_date FROM game_events WHERE event_type = 'Competition' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM game_events ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_type = 'Game'
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_date FROM game_events WHERE event_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY event_date LIMIT 5
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_description FROM game_events WHERE event_type IN ('Update', 'Patch')
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_description FROM game_events WHERE event_description LIKE '%bug%'
SELECT * FROM game_events;
SELECT event_name, event_time FROM game_events ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM game_events WHERE event_id = 10;
SELECT notification_title, notification_text FROM notifications;
SELECT notification_title, notification_date FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM game_events WHERE event_time >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_date DESC
SELECT event_name, event_time FROM game_events JOIN notifications ON game_events.event_id = notifications.notification_id
SELECT event_name, event_time, notification_title FROM game_events LEFT JOIN notifications ON game_events.event_id = notifications.notification_id
SELECT event_name, COUNT(event_id) AS event_count FROM game_events GROUP BY event_name
SELECT * FROM game_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM game_events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT notification_id, player_id, notification_message FROM player_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Offer';
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_start_date, promotion_end_date FROM promotions WHERE promotion_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM game_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;

SELECT event_name, event_description FROM game_events WHERE event_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT player_id, notification_type FROM player_notifications WHERE notification_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_description, promotion_end_date FROM promotions WHERE promotion_start_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT notification_id, notification_message FROM player_notifications INNER JOIN promotions ON player_notifications.player_id = promotions.promotion_id;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_level = 3;
SELECT notification_message FROM notifications WHERE notification_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_description FROM promotions ORDER BY promotion_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_description FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND event_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_description FROM promotions WHERE promotion_start_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT notification_type, notification_message FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, email, signup_date FROM players ORDER BY signup_date DESC;

SELECT player_name, email, signup_date FROM players WHERE signup_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date, is_active FROM promotions WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE signup_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_date FROM game_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT notification_type, message FROM player_notifications WHERE is_read = false AND created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE is_active = true;
